page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: There are fourteen farms in the area all engaged in mixed farming. {Two of the farms, Lanwithan and Newham {appear to have rented out their fields {to neighbouring farms and use the farm {complex as holiday accommodation. The farms are primarily engaged in dairy farming and only two or three have sheep. There is approximately one square kilometre of mixed woodland spread around the area all of which is privately owned. {The Forestry Commission}and the {Duchy}own coniferous woodlands all outside the area.
